articles.title: Who gets Kennedy Center Honors under Trump? George Strait, Kiss, Michael Crawford being eyed. - The Washington Post
articles.description: The president will announce this year’s honorees Wednesday. The arts complex’s marquee awards ceremony may see significant changes as Trump continues to overhaul the institution he took over in February.

articles.title: Dolly Parton offers advice for Kelly Clarkson and Reba McEntire as they grieve Brandon Blackstock's death - Entertainment Weekly
articles.description: Dolly Parton has some words of wisdom and comfort for her friends Kelly Clarkson and Reba McEntire as they grieve the death of Brandon Blackstock.

articles.title: Joe Jonas Leaks 'Camp Rock 3' Plans to Get Out of 'Hot Ones' Wing Challenge: 'Sorry Disney!' - TheWrap
articles.description: Joe Jonas revealed plans for "Camp Rock 3" in order to dodge eating another spicy wing in "Hot Ones Versus."

articles.title: Taylor Swift just gave Travis Kelce a starring role in her next era - Business Insider
articles.description: Taylor Swift is merging the marketing campaign for her new album, "The Life of a Showgirl," with the business ventures of her boyfriend, Travis Kelce.

articles.title: ‘Weapons’ Fires Off Best Monday In August For Horror Movie At Domestic B.O. - Deadline
articles.description: 'Weapons' posted a record Monday for a horror movie in August with $5.2M. Second weekend looking $21M.

articles.title: Danielle Spencer, child star from "What's Happening!!," dies at 60 - CBS News
articles.description: Known for her role as Dee Thomas on the 1970s sitcom "What's Happening," Danielle Spencer has died at the age of 60.

articles.title: Butterfly Review: Daniel Dae Kim Leads Prime Video's Slick Spy Drama - TVGuide.com
articles.description: The South Korea-set series compensates for shallow family dynamics with fast-paced action

articles.title: Kevin Hart Teams With Netflix On Stand-Up Competition Series - Deadline
articles.description: Kevin Hart is set to exec produce a new stand-up competition series for Netflix, focused on finding the next big name in comedy, Deadline can reveal.

articles.title: Sean “Diddy” Combs Doubles Defamation Damages, Demands $100M in Fresh Legal Filing - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The rap mogul is suing Courtney Burgess and his attorney over statements made on NewsNation regarding alleged video of him engaging in sexual encounters with minors and celebrities.

articles.title: Raw is Wretched: WWE falls flat in Quebec City, mon ami - Cageside Seats
articles.description: ﻿A string of disappointing finishes led to a lackluster night of WWE programming.

articles.title: Daniel Day-Lewis Returns in First Film Since Retiring Eight Years Ago - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: A first look at the Oscar winner in his new father-son project, 'Anemone.'

articles.title: Jimmy Kimmel Says He Obtained Italian Citizenship to Flee 'Unbelievably' Bad Trump Administration - Rolling Stone
articles.description: Jimmy Kimmel has obtained Italian citizenship, saying it is a response to the Donald Trump Administration's "unbelievable" policies.

articles.title: American Eagle Foot Traffic Falls Nearly 9% Year-Over-Year Amid Sydney Sweeney Controversy - Forbes
articles.description: Foot traffic is down at American Eagle by almost 9% year-over-year for the week of Aug. 3, according to retail data firm Pass_by.

articles.title: ‘Alien: Earth’ Star Timothy Olyphant Wants Everybody to Relax About Reboots - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: As he swaps his cowboy hat for some frosty tips in the Noah Hawley series, the actor discusses the joy of revisiting work, discovering the "sweet spot" of fame and his love for former co-star Walton Goggins.

articles.title: ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ to Hit Theaters as Sing-Along Event - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The Aug. 23-24 select theatrical run is the latest milestone for the Netflix movie and soundtrack’s global success.

articles.title: Cindy Lee Announces Tour - Pitchfork
articles.description: The Diamond Jubilee star returns to the road for their first shows in more than a year

articles.title: Brent Hinds Confirms He Was Kicked Out of Mastodon, Slams Ex-Bandmates As "Disgusting" - Consequence of Sound
articles.description: Brent Hinds has confirmed that he was kicked out of Mastodon in a new Instagram comment disparaging his former bandmates.

articles.title: Travis Kelce Says Dating Taylor Swift Still Feels Normal: 'We're Just Two People That Are in Love' - Rolling Stone
articles.description: Travis Kelce details relationship with Taylor Swift, noting that the media and public haven't influenced how they fell in love and navigate dating.

articles.title: Jennifer Aniston says she and Gwyneth Paltrow discuss mutual ex Brad Pitt - BBC
articles.description: Asked if they ever discuss their mutual ex, she says: "Oh, of course. How can we not? We're girls."

articles.title: Eddie Van Halen’s 1982 Kramer Electric Guitar Expected to Fetch $2M-3M at Sotheby’s Auction - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: A previous Sotheby’s sale for a guitar owned by Van Halen — that one on display in the band’s “Hot for Teacher” music video — netted $3,932,000 in April 2023.
